hero.subtitle: CabeÃ§a de Queijo is a fan club for the American National Football (NFL) Team - Green Bay Packers in Brasil. We are a group of fans that love the Packers and want to share our passion with other fans in Brasil.

sellingPoints.title: Why Should You Root For the Green Bay Packers?
sellingPoints.subtext: The Green Bay Packers have a rich history, filled with numerous championships and legendary players. Rooting for the Packers means joining a global community of passionate fans. Plus, who doesn't love cheese?

sellingPoints.title: Rich History
sellingPoints.description: The Green Bay Packers were founded in 1919 and have won 13 championships, more than any other team in the NFL.

sellingPoints.title: Global Community
sellingPoints.description: Rooting for the Packers means joining a global community of passionate fans.

sellingPoints.title: Cheeseheads
sellingPoints.description: Packers fans are affectionately known as 'Cheeseheads', a fun and unique part of NFL fan culture.

sellingPoints.title: Lambeau Field
sellingPoints.description: The Packers' home, Lambeau Field, is one of the most iconic stadiums in all of sports.

sellingPoints.title: Non-Profit Ownership
sellingPoints.description: The Packers are the only non-profit, community-owned franchise in the NFL.

sellingPoints.title: Competitive Team
sellingPoints.description: The Packers are consistently competitive and have a strong team, making their games exciting to watch.

cta.subtext: Join a chapter near you or start your own.

startAChapterPage.title: Start a Chapter
startAChapterPage.subTitle: Are you interested in starting a chapter in your area?
startAChapterPage.guide: Drop us an email with your name, location, and a brief description of why you want to start a chapter. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

memberBenefits.title: What Membership Gets You
memberBenefits.subtext: Embrace the excitement of being a Packers fan in Brasil. Unite with fellow fans who share your passion and excitement for the legendary Green Bay Packers. CabeÃ§a de Queijo is here to bring together the Packers' vibrant fan community in Brasil.

benefits.title: Community and Unity
benefits.description: Become a vital part of a global Packers community, connecting with fans locally and worldwide through chapters and an exclusive WhatsApp group, fostering unity and camaraderie.

benefits.title: Information and Updates
benefits.description: Stay abreast of the latest Packers news, updates, and legendary stories through regular email subscriptions.

benefits.title: Events and Gatherings
benefits.description: Join game day gatherings and community events, where you can unite with fellow fans to celebrate and support the team.

benefits.title: Exclusive Content
benefits.description: Dive into the unique Cheesehead culture with exclusive content and virtual tours of the iconic Lambeau Field.

benefits.title: Unique Experiences
benefits.description: Enjoy unique experiences tailored just for the members, including special events, exclusive merchandise, and more.
